detectors.description:
DiceGame.calculatePayout(uint256,uint256) (contracts/DiceGame.sol#225-233) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- multiplier = (100 * 1e18) / prediction (contracts/DiceGame.sol#228)
	- grossPayout = (betAmount * multiplier) / 1e18 (contracts/DiceGame.sol#229)
